##Data Cleaning

```{r}
threshold <- 0.001
Strawberry <- Strawberry[, colMeans(is.na(Strawberry)) < threshold]
glimpse(Strawberry)
```

```{r}
Strawberry_split<-Strawberry%>% 
  filter(grepl('HERBICIDE',Domain,ignore.case = TRUE))
Strawberry_split_1<-Strawberry_split%>%
  select(-Domain,-Geo.Level)
  
```
```{r}
strawberry_split_1 <- Strawberry_split_1 %>%
  separate(col = Data.item, into = c("Commodity","Chemical","Action","Unit"), sep = ",\\s*", fill = "right")
```
